alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Greer; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:40AM CDT until July 09 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR COMANCHE...SOUTHWESTERN CADDO...EASTERN JACKSON...CENTRAL KIOWA...NORTHERN TILLMAN AND SOUTHEASTERN GREER COUNTIES... At 338 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Carnegie to 3 miles northwest of Tipton, moving east at 40 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS FOR Tipton, Snyder, Indiahoma, and Lawton. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Altus Mesonet site reported 77 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Altus, Frederick, Cache, Elgin, Apache, Snyder, Fletcher, Cyril, Tipton, Blair, Olustee, Chattanooga, Mountain Park, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Roosevelt, Manitou, Martha, and Faxon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Greer; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman
